article_title: Can A Financial Assets Tax Be A Pro-Growth Replacement For The Capital Gains Tax?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: What do your Apple stock, your Greek government bonds and your vacation home in Florida have in common? If you sell them and manage to make a profit, this profit will be taxed up to 43.4%.
